summary: The code is cloning a GitHub repository, changing the directory to it, and installing two packages (husky and npm) for further usage.

details.comment: The code is cloning a GitHub repository, changing the directory to it, and installing two packages (husky and npm) for further usage.
details.content:
git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/Binaryify/NeteaseCloudMusicApi.git
cd NeteaseCloudMusicApi
npm install -g husky
npm install -g .
